part.content: CHAPTER I : OF THE COMMUNICATION, ACCEPTANCE AND REVOCATION OF PROPOSALS. Sec. 3 - 9.
CHAPTER II : OF CONTRACTS, VOIDABLE CONTRACTS AND VOID AGREEMENTS. Sec. 10 - 30.
Void agreements. Sec. 24 - 30.
CHAPTER III : OF CONTINGENT CONTRACTS. Sec. 31 - 36.
CHAPTER IV : OF THE PERFORMANCE OF CONTRACTS. Sec. 37 - 67.
Contracts which must be performed. Sec. 37 - 39.
By whom contracts must be performed. Sec. 40 - 45.
Time and place for performance. Sec. 46 - 50.
Performance of reciprocal promises. Sec. 51 - 58.
Appropriation of payments. Sec. 59 - 61.
Contracts which need not be performed. Sec. 62 - 67.
CHAPTER V : OF CERTAIN RELATIONS RESEMBLING THOSE CREATED BY CONTRACT. Sec. 68 - 72.
CHAPTER VI : OF THE CONSEQUENCES OF BREACH OF CONTRACT. Sec. 73 - 75.
CHAPTER VII : SALE OF GOODS. Sec. 76-123. [Repealed]
CHAPTER VIII : OF INDEMNITY AND GUARANTEE. Sec. 124 - 147.
CHAPTER IX : OF BAILMENT. Sec. 148 - 181.
Bailments of pledges. Sec. 172 - 179.
Suits by bailees or bailors against wrong-doers. Sec. 180 - 181.
CHAPTER X : AGENCY. Sec. 182 - 238.
Appointment and authority of agents. Sec. 182 - 189.
Sub-agents. Sec. 190 - 195.
Ratification. Sec. 196 - 200.
Revocation of authority. Sec. 201 - 210.
Agent's duty to principal. Sec. 211 - 221.
Principal's duty to agent. Sec. 222 - 225.
Effect of agency on contracts with third persons. Sec. 226 - 238.
CHAPTER XI : OF PARTNERSHIP. Sec. 239-266. [Repealed]
